title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Programming and Data StructuresObjects, Classes, object modeling, object relationships; Static and dynamic modeling, object oriented language features; JAVA, UML; Object oriented analysis and design, client server and distributed objects, client server implementation; CORBA, COM/DCOM.
